name: prompt-chain-manager
title: Prompt Chain Manager
description: Build and manage multi-part prompts for LLMs by chaining text snippets.
author: teerapat_jenrungrot

commands.name: managePromptChain
commands.title: Manage Prompt Chain
commands.description: View, manage, reorder, and copy the current prompt chain.

commands.name: addClipboardToChain
commands.title: Add Clipboard to Chain
commands.description: Quickly add clipboard content as a new chunk to the prompt chain.

commands.name: addTemplateToChain
commands.title: Add Template to Chain
commands.description: Browse and add a predefined template to the prompt chain.

commands.name: copyFinalPrompt
commands.title: Copy Final Prompt
commands.description: Copy the combined text of enabled chunks to your clipboard.

commands.name: clearPromptChain
commands.title: Clear Entire Prompt Chain
commands.description: Removes all stored chunks from the prompt chain after confirmation.

preferences.name: includeHeadersInCopy
preferences.title: Include Headers in Copied Output
preferences.description: Prefix each chunk with its header (e.g., '--- [Header] ---') when copying.
preferences.label: Include Headers
